description: Angular component implementing a game canvas with rendering loop, input handling, and lifecycle management.

classes.name: GameCanvasComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing the game rendering canvas, input events, and game state interactions.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Initializes the canvas and starts the game loop after the view is initialized.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up resources, cancels animation frames upon component destruction.

methods.name: cancelAnimLoop
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing animation frame request if exists.

methods.name: startLoop
methods.description: Starts the game rendering loop, ensuring no multiple loops run concurrently.

methods.name: onResize
methods.description: Handles window resize events to adjust the canvas size appropriately.

methods.name: resizeCanvas
methods.description: Updates the game canvas size via the game service, with a delay for stability.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Main game loop handling rendering, game state checks, and scheduling next frame.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Initializes and starts a new game session with audio and loop setup.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Restarts the game by invoking startGame.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard input for game controls, with restrictions when input is disabled.

methods.name: onKeyUp
methods.description: Handles key release events for game controls.

methods.name: onTouchStart
methods.description: Handles touch start events for game controls.

methods.name: onTouchMove
methods.description: Handles touch move events for game controls.

methods.name: onTouchEnd
methods.description: Handles touch end events for game controls.
